definition[0]: used to say that something is interesting, useful, or helpful
example[0]: A lot of the small towns in the area are definitely worth visiting.
example[1]: The film is well worth seeing.
example[2]: The local museum is worth a visit.
definition[1]: used to say that someone should do something because they will gain something from it
example[3]: It was a great evening, and definitely worth all the hard work.
example[4]: It’s worth checking the details of the contract before you sign it.
example[5]: It’s well worth getting there early if you want a good seat.
